title: How we grew from 0 to 4 million women on our fashion app, with a vertical m
excerpt: Three years ago we launched Chicisimo, our goal was to offer automated outfit advice. Today, with over 4 million women on the app, we want to share how our data and machine learning approach helped us grow. It’s been chaotic but it is now under control.
